src_original: sa punā rāgānukūlaḥ pūrvahasitaramitakrīḍitādy anusmarato rāgāṃśikaś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ /  śamathaparipanthakarmakam //
tgt_original: 謂貪欲分，隨念淨相心不寂靜為體，障奢摩他為業。

src_original: kauśīdyasanniśrayadānakarmakam /  aśraddhadhānasya prayogacchandābhāvāt kausīdyasanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //  kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ ,
tgt_original: 謂愚癡分，依著睡眠倚臥為樂、心不策勵為體，障修方便善品為業。

src_original: etac ca kuśalapakṣaprayogaparipanthakarmakam //  [p. 71] lobhadveṣamohakausīdyeṣu pramādaḥ prajñapyate ,  yathāvyākhyāteṣu /
tgt_original: 謂依懈怠及貪瞋癡不修善法，於有漏法心不防護為體，憎惡損善所依為業。
何等忘念？ 謂諸煩惱相應念為體，散亂所依為業。
此復名字，無異轉故。 何等異生性？

src_original: [p. 87] alābhaḥ punar atrāryadharmāṇām anutpādaḥ /  tathā hy anutpannāryadharmaḥ sattvasantānaḥ pṛthagjana ity ucyate /  āryadharmotpādāt tv ārya iti //
tgt_original: 謂於聖法不得，假立異生性。

src_original: hetuphalaprabandhānupacchedaḥ pravṛttir ity ucyate /  naikasmin kṣaṇe prabandhoparame vā pravṛttyupacāraḥ //
tgt_original: 謂於因果相續不斷，假立流轉。

src_original: hetuphalanānātve pratiniyamavyavasthā /  hetuphalanānātvaṃ punar iṣṭasya viṣayasya sucaritam ,  aniṣṭasya duścaritam ityādi phalānāṃ pṛthag anyonyahetutā //
tgt_original: 謂於因果種種差別，假立定異。

src_original: hetuphalānurūpye yoga iti prajñaptiḥ /  tadyathā dānasya bhogasampad anurūpeti yujyate dānasya bhogasampat phalam //
tgt_original: 謂於因果相稱，假立相應。
謂於因果迅疾流轉，假立勢速。

src_original: hetuphalaikaikapravṛttāv anukrama iti prajñaptiḥ /  ekaikatvena pravṛttir ayugapatpravṛttiḥ //
tgt_original: 謂於因果一一流轉，假立次第。
